turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how may i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I wanted to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. let's get the order started. where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what would you like from bella luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to get three difference pizzas. All of them are going to be medium. One of them can I please have spinach and red onions? The second one pepperoni. And the third one vegetarian.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And could I get extra cheese on all three of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what kind of crust did you want on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I do the first one deep dish, the second one thin crust, and the third one hand tossed?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want 3 medium pizzas, 1 with spinach and red onions deep dish, 1 with pepperoni with thin crust, and 1 vegetarian that's hand tossed. all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $45.29 is the total. did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, you're so welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good bye.
